about_the_game:
Traitors in the Hood immerses players in a thrilling First-Person Multiplayer experience set on a mysterious and treacherous planet. After a catastrophic crash landing, eight survivors find themselves stranded and desperate to escape this dangerous planet. Their only hope is to repair their damaged rocket and make an escape.

Players must work together, utilizing their knowledge and unique tools. Each survivor is assigned their own room, filled with its own unique power, resources and tools necessary for repairing the rocket. Draw magic when cauldron will be present in your room and make items such as mixtures, magic scrolls and other magic stuff. Other time, use item re-rolling machine to redraw items or use one of many other stations. However, there are traitors in this survivors community, who will stop at nothing to sabotage their chances of escape.

Use different tools to achieve your goal: use mining tools such as drills to mine resources, craft items in workbench station, use guns to kill unwanted ones, use magic to freeze your target or finally make use of hidden, behind painting ventilation system, which is connected to all rooms. After all, be carefull and watch for your oxygen level: you have equipment from crash, but it will not last forever.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains weapons, blood, and human skeleton parts. Also being a traitor implies being violent.
